metadata.title: CVE-2021-47145 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: btrfs:do not BUG_ON in link_to_fixup_dir While doing error injection testing Igot the following panic kernel BUG at fs/btrfs/tree-log.c:1862! invalidopcode: 0000 [#1] SMP NOPTI CPU: 1 PID: 7836 Comm: mount Not tainted5.13.0-rc1+ #305 Hardware name: QEMU Standard PC (Q35 + ICH9, 2009), BIOS1.13.0-2.fc32 04/01/2014 RIP: 0010:link_to_fixup_dir+0xd5/0xe0 RSP:0018:ffffb5800180fa30 EFLAGS: 00010216 RAX: fffffffffffffffb RBX:00000000fffffffb RCX: ffff8f595287faf0 RDX: ffffb5800180fa37 RSI:ffff8f5954978800 RDI: 0000000000000000 RBP: ffff8f5953af9450 R08:0000000000000019 R09: 0000000000000001 R10: 000151f408682970 R11:0000000120021001 R12: ffff8f5954978800 R13: ffff8f595287faf0 R14:ffff8f5953c77dd0 R15: 0000000000000065 FS: 00007fc5284c8c40(0000)GS:ffff8f59bbd00000(0000) knlGS:0000000000000000 CS: 0010 DS: 0000 ES: 0000CR0: 0000000080050033 CR2: 00007fc5287f47c0 CR3: 000000011275e002 CR4:0000000000370ee0 Call Trace: replay_one_buffer+0x409/0x470 ?btree_read_extent_buffer_pages+0xd0/0x110 walk_up_log_tree+0x157/0x1e0walk_log_tree+0xa6/0x1d0 btrfs_recover_log_trees+0x1da/0x360 ?replay_one_extent+0x7b0/0x7b0 open_ctree+0x1486/0x1720btrfs_mount_root.cold+0x12/0xea ? __kmalloc_track_caller+0x12f/0x240legacy_get_tree+0x24/0x40 vfs_get_tree+0x22/0xb0vfs_kern_mount.part.0+0x71/0xb0 btrfs_mount+0x10d/0x380 ?vfs_parse_fs_string+0x4d/0x90 legacy_get_tree+0x24/0x40vfs_get_tree+0x22/0xb0 path_mount+0x433/0xa10 __x64_sys_mount+0xe3/0x120do_syscall_64+0x3d/0x80 entry_SYSCALL_64_after_hwframe+0x44/0xae We can get-EIO or any number of legitimate errors from btrfs_search_slot(), panicinghere is not the appropriate response. The error path for this code handleserrors properly, simply return the error.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47145` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required

linux-image-6.7.0-2001-raspi-realtime - 6.7.0-2001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-realtime - 6.8.0-1008.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
